document: FINANCING MEDICAL CARE: A WELFARE ECONOMICS ANALYSIS by Irwin Garfinkel A dissertation submitted in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of Doctor of Philosophy (Special Work and Economics) in The University of Michigan 1970 Doctoral Committee: Professor Harvey E. Brazer, Chairman Professer Sidney G. Winter Associate Professer Paul J. Feldstein Assistant Professor William B. Neenan Lecturer Philip Beeth
